pages.text: When you craft items like flintlocks, blunderbusses, smoke bombs, etc., you'll need to use some small parts that can't be crafted with a standard crafting table.$(br2)The small parts table allows you to fabricate small pieces from a material and a blueprint.
The blueprint that you need for a specific type of part can vary. You will always use a blank blueprint as a base for all blueprints. The blueprints are crafted using a standard crafting table.
Crafting a blueprint involves laying pieces into the blank from a crafting table. On the following pages, you'll find the recipes for various blueprints.
$(l)Requires:$() Iron ingot, generic small parts blueprint

pages.title: Generic, Throwable Bomb
pages.text: $(l)Requires:$() Any metal ingot, metal throwable bomb blueprint

pages.title: Generic, Metal Tool
pages.text: $(l)Requires:$() Any metal ingot, metal tool parts blueprint
$(l)Requires:$() Any wood plank, gauntlet scaffolding blueprint
